strategy: Daemonic Incursion armies have a strategy rating of 0.
initiative: All Daemon formations have an initiative of 1+. Mortal formations have an initiative of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on a Daemonic Incursion, aided and abetted by mortal Chaos Cultist allies.

sections.name: 1+ Exalted Greater Daemons. Max one Exalted Greater Daemon for each part of 1000 points in the army.

formations.name: Daemon Legion of Slaanesh
formations.units: 3 Herald of Slaanesh, 3 Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Daemon Legion of Nurgle
formations.units: 3 Herald of Nurgle, 3 Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Daemon Legion of Khorne
formations.units: 3 Herald of Khorne, 3 Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Daemon Legion of Tzeench
formations.units: 3 Herald of Tzeench, 3 Lesser Daemon Pool points

sections.name: Mortals
sections.description: Up to a fourth of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Cultist Coven of Chaos Undivided
formations.units: One Demagogue, five Cultist and/or Mutants, 1 Chaos Altar

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

upgrades.title: Daemonic Incursion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Soul Grinders
items.description: Add up to three Soul Grinders

items.name: Keeper of Secrets
items.description: Replace one Herald of Slaanesh with a Keeper of Secrets

items.name: Great Unclean One
items.description: Replace one Herald of Nurgle with a Great Unclean One

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.description: Replace one Herald of Khorne with a Bloodthirster

items.name: Lord of Change
items.description: Replace one Herald of Tzeench with a Lord of Change

items.name: Herald Mounts
items.description: Replace up to three Heralds with Mounted Heralds

items.name: Chaos Spawn
items.description: Replace up to five Cultists with Chaos Spawn

items.name: Chaos Gate
items.description: Add a Chaos Gate to a Chaos Altar
